function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Excess of chlorine in water could generate harmful effects on people's health","Impact":"Increased risk of health issues due to excessive chlorine in water","Mitigation":"Monitoring and regulating chlorine levels in water treatment plants","Technologies":"Water quality monitoring systems","People":"General population using water from treatment plants","Owner":"Water treatment plant authorities"},{"Description":"Increase in domestic and medical waste","Impact":"Potential waste management issues and environmental pollution","Mitigation":"Implementing efficient waste management systems and recycling programs","Technologies":"Waste sorting and recycling technologies","People":"General population and environmental authorities","Owner":"Local and national governments"},{"Description":"Temporary decrease in GHG emissions with no long-term impact","Impact":"Limited effect on overall GHG concentrations and climate change","Mitigation":"Ratification of environmental commitments and structural changes in economies","Technologies":"Renewable energy systems and carbon capture technologies","People":"Global population and government authorities","Owner":"International environmental organizations"}]}
